summary: They were happy with their lives; they have all turned into profane, swearing little buggers.  - MAKES THE ANIMALS OF SKYRIM SWEAR!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12379-1-1334955097.png[/img][/center]
[center][color=orange][size=8][font=impact]NEXUS EXCUSIVE[/center][/color][/size][/font][center] 
[color=orange][size=7][font=impact][u][b]THE CORRECT WAY[/b][/u][/color][/size][/font]

[youtube]p4dP3LhBJVY[/youtube][youtube]LyeYDSVqRO4[/youtube]


Upon the arrival of the Dovahkiin, all the animals of Skyrim became really pissed off. They were happy with their lives; and now that the Dovahkiin is here, they are all probably going to be killed.  They have all turned into profane, swearing little buggers, and will be until the Dovahkiin leaves.  
_________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=pink][size=10][font=impact]What the hell does this do?![/color][/size][/font]
[color=pink]This mod changes the sounds enemies make. They scream obscenities, they swear; they are just profane and vulgar.[/color]
____________________________________________________________________________________
[size=4][color=red]Anybody who wants to make a video showcasing this mod is welcome to do so![/color][/size]
______________________________________________________________________________

This will eventually change the sound of everything in Skyrim. So far, most enemies have been changed. There will be MUCH more to come! Stay tuned! [color=green][size=6]Don\'t forget to endorse if you like this mod! Thanks!
Suggestions are also welcome![/size][/color]
_________________________________________________________________________________________
[size=5][color=red]UPCOMING[/color]
-A refinement of and additions to the current sounds
-A profane, vulgar overhaul of the Shouts
-New lines for unimportant dialogue
-An incorporation of the suggestions made in the comments, (if I see any good ones!)
-MUSIC OVERHAUL![/size]
_________________________________________________________________________________________

To download:

Extract the \"sound\" folder to:
C:\\STEAM\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

OR

Use the ModManger. Simple!
_________________________________________________________________________________________
My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11153]Cwazy Skywim[/url]	
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18970]Better Skyrim Intro[/url]	
____________________________________________________________________________________
[size=5][color=orange]THIS MOD CONTAINS VULGAR LANGUAGE! IF YOU ARE OFFENDED BY VULGARITY, PROFANITY, OR INSANITY, THEN KINDLY GET OUT:D[/size][/color][/center]
[center][youtube]ONAFWmQpM7w[/youtube][/center]
author: BOBONATOR2
